summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 14%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (up 8 mbar), cloud levels (up 487 m), and light levels (up 4185 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 171 m), and light levels (up 2501 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 486.6m lower than yesterday, 171.4m lower than past week, 109.1m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 397m to a maximum of 2140m, averaging 780.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 952.3m and 889.9m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; hot temperatures will prevail. Also, very clammy and humid and moderately breezy. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Weather could become unsettled.
